definition[0]: someone who collects things that are interesting or attractive
example[1]: The painting was bought by a private collector.
definition[1]: someone whose job is to collect taxes, tickets, debts etc
definition[2]: someone whose job is to collect something, for example taxes or debts
example[2]: a wave of strikes by tax collectors
example[3]: When Tina fell behind on her credit-card bill, debt collectors bombarded her employer with phone calls.
example[4]: An American art collector paid $1.2 million for a drawing by Matisse.
example[5]: The table was sold to a private collector.
